name: Geodude

passive.name: Sturdy
passive.effect: If this Pokemon has no damage counters on it, if it would be Knocked Out, it takes 40 damage instead.

attacks.name: Smack Down
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokemon resists Ground Type, this attack ignores Resistance and deals 10 more damage.

flavor: Strong arms let it adapt well to flying foes. A tossed stone can catch other Pokemon unaware.
